name: Hivemind Neutron (1.01)
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("hivemind.me"){ body{background:#212121!important;color:#698CC0!important;font-family:"Trebuchet MS",Trebuchet,tahoma,serif!important;font-size:16px!important;}h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6{color:#698CC0!important;}a{color:#C9BE89!important;text-decoration:none!important;}a:hover{color:#EEFEBB!important;text-decoration:underline!important;}#main_layout{font-size:1em!important;}#header .main_menu{font-weight:700!important;background:transparent!important;border:none!important;}#header .main_menu a{font-size:.8em!important;font-weight:700!important;color:#C9BE89!important;}#header .main_menu a:hover{font-size:.8em!important;font-weight:700!important;color:#EEFEBB!important;background:transparent!important;}.node_title{font-size:1.2em!important;}.node_title a{color:#3941AC!important;}.node_title a:link{text-decoration:none!important;}.node_title a{color:#3941AC!important;}.node_title a:link:hover{text-decoration:underline!important;}.node{background:transparent!important;border-style:solid!important;border-width:0 0 3px!important;-moz-border-image:url(http://i.imgur.com/N0jBBks.png) 0 0 3 stretch!important;-webkit-border-image:url(http://i.imgur.com/N0jBBks.png) 0 0 3 stretch!important;-o-border-image:url(http://i.imgur.com/N0jBBks.png) 0 0 3 stretch!important;border-image:url(http://i.imgur.com/N0jBBks.png) 0 0 3 stretch!important;}.node_tags{color:#999!important;}.node_tags a{color:#999!important;text-decoration:none!important;}.node_tags a:hover{color:#999!important;text-decoration:underline!important;}.node_footer{border:none!important;}.node_footer .comments_count{color:#4F7942!important;content:counter(de-cnt,decimal)!important;counter-increment:de-cnt 1!important;font:bold 11px tahoma!important;}span.spoiler{background-color:#575757!important;color:#575757!important;}span.spoiler:hover{background-color:#575757!important;color:#48B0FD!important;}.node_cut{font-size:.9em!important;}.node_cut:after{content:" >>"!important;font-size:.9em!important;}.hidden_text{background:#212121!important;border:1px solid transparent!important;border-radius:10px 10px 0 0!important;}.hidden_text_head{background:url(http://i.imgur.com/9k1IL05.png) repeat scroll 0 0 transparent!important;border:1px transparent!important;border-radius:10px 10px 0 0!important;}.hidden_text_body{background:url(http://i.imgur.com/9k1IL05.png) repeat scroll 0 0 transparent!important;border-top:transparent!important;}.paginator span strong{background:none repeat scroll 0 0 #2C2C2C!important;}.paginator .scroll_trough{background:#575757!important;}.paginator .scroll_thumb,.paginator .current_page_mark{background:#2C2C2C!important;}.footer{color:#C9BE89!important;font-size:.8em!important;font-weight:700!important;}.footer a{background:transparent!important;}.comment_head{background:transparent!important;border-left:1px solid #575757!important;border-right:1px solid #575757!important;border-top:1px solid #575757!important;border-top-left-radius:10px!important;border-top-right-radius:10px!important;}.comment_body{background:transparent!important;border-left:1px solid #575757!important;border-right:1px solid #575757!important;border-bottom:1px solid #575757!important;border-bottom-left-radius:10px!important;border-bottom-right-radius:10px!important;}.comment_new .comment_body{border:none!important;}.comment_new a.comment_biglink,a.biglink{border:none!important;color:#F60!important;font-size:16px!important;text-decoration:none!important;}.comment_new a.comment_biglink:before,a.biglink:before{content:"["!important;color:#698CC0!important;font-size:16px!important;}.comment_new a.comment_biglink:after,a.biglink:after{content:"]"!important;color:#698CC0!important;font-size:16px!important;}.comment_new a.comment_biglink:hover,a.biglink:hover{color:#EEFEBB!important;text-decoration:underline!important;font-size:16px!important;}.markItUpContainer{background:#2C2C2C!important;border:1px solid #575757!important;border-radius:10px!important;font:12px "Trebuchet MS",Trebuchet,tahoma,serif!important;padding:6px 15px 4px!important;}.html .markItUpEditor,.markItUpEditor,.comment_reply textarea{background:none repeat-x scroll 0 0 #111!important;color:#CCC!important;}.loginform{border:none!important;}.loginform .enter{background:transparent!important;}input[type=submit],input[type=button],button,.loginform .enter{-moz-appearance:none!important;background-color:#333!important;background-image:0!important;border-color:#151515 #000!important;border-radius:5px 5px 5px 5px!important;border-style:solid!important;border-width:1px!important;color:#AAA!important;font-weight:700!important;}input[type=submit]:hover,input[type=button]:hover,button:hover{background-color:#212121!important;background-image:0 #505050 #151515!important;border:1px solid #006!important;color:#ccf!important;box-shadow:0 0 4px 1px #48b0fd inset!important;}.markItUpResizeHandle{background-image:url(http://i.imgur.com/HLpzWlK.png)!important;}#fancybox-outer{background:none repeat scroll 0 0 #212121!important;height:100%!important;position:relative!important;width:100%!important;}.profile_holder h2,.profile_holder .profile_points{color:#999!important;}.pm_list_even{background:transparent!important;}.pm_list_container th{background:#1E1E1E!important;color:#999!important;}div.hidden_text_head div:after{content:":"!important;}div.hidden_text_head div{font-style:oblique!important;color:rgba(105,140,192,.75)!important;}blockquote{border-left:0 solid #789922!important;color:#789922!important;}blockquote:before{color:#789922!important;}blockquote:before{content:">"!important;}.nodecensor_edit .html .markItUpButton1 a{background-image:url(http://i.imgur.com/NPmO4Dd.png)!important;}.nodecensor_edit .html .markItUpButton2 a{background-image:url(http://i.imgur.com/ES7F8G3.png)!important;}.nodecensor_edit .html .markItUpButton3 a{background-image:url(http://i.imgur.com/uDyzyr9.png)!important;}.nodecensor_edit .html .markItUpButton4 a{background-image:url(http://i.imgur.com/mwLeQ36.png)!important;}.nodecensor_edit .html .markItUpButton5 a{background-image:url(http://i.imgur.com/fhrXYf0.png)!important;}.nodecensor_edit .html .markItUpButton6 a{background-image:url(http://i.imgur.com/zoyQLxu.png)!important;}.nodecensor_edit .html .markItUpButton8 a{background-image:url(http://i.imgur.com/Sp1k15g.png)!important;}.nodecensor_edit .html .markItUpButton9 a{background-image:url(http://i.imgur.com/4ZB4jHZ.png)!important;}.nodecensor_edit .html .markItUpButton10 a{background-image:url(http://i.imgur.com/j8jBDUH.png)!important;}.nodecensor_edit .html .markItUpButton15 a{background-image:url(http://i.imgur.com/2u2p3Ay.png)!important;}.nodecensor_edit .html .markItUpButton16 a{background-image:url(http://i.imgur.com/fmsJpeb.png)!important;}.nodecensor_edit .html .markItUpButton17 a{background-image:url(http://i.imgur.com/bZxiQaI.png)!important;}#pm_send_form{background:#2C2C2C!important;}#Subject *,#To *,#Message *{background-color:#212121!important;}#fancybox-overlay{background:#212121!important;opacity:0.75!important;}#fancybox-content{background:#212121!important;border-color:#212121!important;}#tooltip{background:rgba(33,33,33,0.85)!important;border:1px solid #575757!important;border-radius:10px!important;box-shadow:0 0 5px #575757!important;font-family:"Trebuchet MS",Trebuchet,tahoma,serif!important;font-size:16px!important;}#tooltip h3,#tooltip div,.sitestats,.sitestats_last_update{font-family:"Trebuchet MS",Trebuchet,tahoma,serif!important;font-size:16px!important;}.comment_head_new{background: url("http://i.imgur.com/TVH2EDQ.png") repeat scroll 0 0 rgba(44,44,44,1) !important;}.comment_head_user{background: url("http://i.imgur.com/Oc11ES6.png") repeat scroll 0 0 rgba(44,44,44,1) !important}}
